document_data.name: Khamamart
document_data.mainbody: '''Khamamart''', also known as the '''Tomb of Fire''', was the fiery [[marble]]-walled final resting place of the Grand Vizar [[Samesaj]] of [[Calimport]].
document_data.Location: Khamamart was built to the east from the city walls of [[Calimport]].
document_data.History: In {{Yearlink|-1095}}, the construction of Khamamart was completed. Soon after the Grand Vizar walked through one of the tomb's flaming walls never to be seen again.
